summary: Implemented all shared types from spec 02-shared-types.md including Wallet Types, Transaction Types, Invoice Types, Payment Types, Notification Types, Fiat Conversion Types, Nostr/Zap Types, UI Component Types, Context Types, Utility Types, Type Guards, Constants, and SDK Re-exports.
